name: The Phantom Knights of Ragged Gloves
description:
A DARK Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as an Xyz Material gains this effect.
â— If it is Xyz Summoned: It gains 1000 ATK.
You can banish this card from your Graveyard; send 1 "Phantom Knights" card from your Deck to the Graveyard. You can only use each effect of "The Phantom Knights of Ragged Gloves" once per turn.
